channel.title: Need Misc.playerNameToCapital();
channel.description: Well, I've seen a few servers have it. But mine just so happens to not have it. I need it for my yell. My name is "Mod Jesse" and when ever I yell it shows "mod jesse". I got a method that capitalizes the first letter. But I need the method that capitalizes the first letter of each word (given there is a space) or the one that reads the name exactly as I input it.

item.title: Need Misc.playerNameToCapital();
item.dc:creator: @sk8rdude461 sk8rdude461
item.description:
@sk8rdude461 wrote:

RiiPiiNFtW:

its Misc.optimizeText unless you rename it. Don’t forget a .toLowerCase() though.

Oh, okay
how would I use it in this instance?

"[Player "+ c.playerName +"]:"

like this?

"[Player "+ c.playerName.optimizeText +"]:"

Edit:
Got it.

"[Player "+ Misc.optimizeText(c.playerName) +"]:";

Edit2:
I lied. It only capitalized the first letter. I would like them both.

Read full topic
